org.xflatdb.xflat.query

Class XPathUpdate

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xflatdb.xflat.query.XPathUpdate

  • public class XPathUpdate
extends java.lang.Object
    Specifies an update operation which sets the value of a matched existing DOM element. The new value must be convertible to Content or String.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  XPathUpdate.UpdateType
      Enumerates the different types of updates.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Adds an additional update operation that sets the values selected by the XPath expression.

      Adds an additional update operation that removes the element or attribute selected by the XPath expression.
      int apply(org.jdom2.Element rowData)
      Applies the update operations to the given DOM Element representing the data in a selected row.

    • Method Detail

      • getUpdates

        public java.util.List<org.xflatdb.xflat.query.XPathUpdate.Update> getUpdates()

      • setConversionService

        public void setConversionService(ConversionService conversionService)
        Sets the conversion service used by this Update operation when it is applied. The conversion service is used to convert values to JDOM elements and attributes.
        Parameters:
        conversionService -

      • set

        public static <T> XPathUpdate set(org.jdom2.xpath.XPathExpression<T> path,
                  java.lang.Object value)
        Creates an update that sets the values selected by the XPath expression. The value will only be modified if it exists. If the XPath expression selects a nonexistent value then no update will be applied.
        Parameters:
        path - The path selecting an element (or elements) to set.
        Returns:
        an XPath update that sets the given value.

      • unset

        public static <T> XPathUpdate unset(org.jdom2.xpath.XPathExpression<T> path)
        Creates an update that removes the element or attribute selected by the XPath expression. The value will only be deleted if it exists. If the XPath expression selects a nonexistent value then no update will be applied.
        Type Parameters:
        T -
        Parameters:
        path - The path selecting an element (or elements) to set.
        Returns:
        an XPath update that deletes the given value.

      • andSet

        public <T> XPathUpdate andSet(org.jdom2.xpath.XPathExpression<T> path,
                     java.lang.Object value)
        Adds an additional update operation that sets the values selected by the XPath expression. The value will only be modified if it exists. If the XPath expression selects a nonexistent value then no update will be applied.
        Parameters:
        path - The path selecting an element (or elements) to set.
        Returns:
        an XPath update that sets the given value.

      • andUnset

        public <T> XPathUpdate andUnset(org.jdom2.xpath.XPathExpression<T> path)
        Adds an additional update operation that removes the element or attribute selected by the XPath expression. The value will only be modified if it exists. If the XPath expression selects a nonexistent value then no update will be applied.
        Parameters:
        path - The path selecting an element (or elements) to set.
        Returns:
        an XPath update that sets the given value.

      • apply

        public int apply(org.jdom2.Element rowData)
        Applies the update operations to the given DOM Element representing the data in a selected row.
        Parameters:
        rowData - The DOM Element representing the data in a selected row.
        Returns:
        true if any updates were applied.
